tr.text.game.grace.explanation: Team %s is down to their last player. In %s minutes they will get the wither effect. In %s minutes the other team will get a glowing effect.
tr.text.game.grace.cancel: There is more than 1 player in Team %s again. Wither effect aborted.
tr.text.game.error.in_progress: There is already a game going on.
tr.text.game.error.empty_team: There need to be players in every team.
tr.text.game.error.arena_not_found: Specified arena ("%s") not found. Was it deleted or renamed?
tr.text.game.error.arena_empty: Specified arena ("%s") is empty. Did you save it?
tr.text.game.win.tie: IT'S A TIE! Nobody wins. Everybody wins.
tr.text.setting.reset.check: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to the defaults? Click here.
tr.text.setting.team.mode.random.name: Team Mode: Fill Random
tr.text.setting.team.mode.random.explana: People who didn't choose a team will be added to a random team. (Tries to create a balanced setup)
tr.text.setting.team.mode.choice.name: Team Mode: Choice Only
tr.text.setting.team.mode.choice.explana: Players who didn't choose a team get put into spectator.
tr.text.setting.team.mode.all_random.exp: No matter how people choose their teams, everyone that hasn't chosen spectator will be assigned one randomly.
tr.text.setting.not_op: You are not an Operator and do not have permission to do this!
tr.text.setting.instruction.op_only: Only operators can perform lobby actions.
tr.text.setting.instruction.coordinates: Displays your coordinates in the actionbar.
tr.text.setting.instruction.start_time: Time between arena generation and game start: %s seconds
tr.text.setting.instruction.effects.nigh: All players have permanent night vision.
tr.text.setting.instruction.effects.hast: All players have a permanent haste effect.
tr.text.setting.instruction.effects.spee: All players have a permanent speed effect.
tr.text.setting.instruction.effects.abso: After respawning, players have %s seconds of absorption
tr.text.setting.instruction.effects.invi: After respawning, players have %s seconds of invisibility
tr.text.setting.instruction.effects.resi: After respawning, players have %s seconds of resistance
tr.text.setting.instruction.effects.stre: After respawning, players have %s seconds of strength
tr.text.setting.instruction.immediate_re: Skip the death screen when respawning.
tr.text.setting.instruction.team.armortr: Equipped armor gets a team-colored trim.
tr.text.admin.arena_overwrite_confirm: "%s" already exists. If you want to overwrite the saved arena, save again in the next 5 seconds.
tr.text.admin.builtin_no_save: Arena "%s" is an arena setup that came with the map. You cannot overwrite this. Please choose a different name.
tr.text.admin.arena_delete_confirm: You're about to permanently delete "%s". THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE! If you want to delete this arena, delete again in the next 5 seconds.
tr.text.admin.builtin_no_delete: Arena "%s" is an arena setup that came with the map. You cannot delete this.
tr.text.admin.arena_exists: "%s" already exists. Choose a different name.
tr.text.admin.arena_created: New arena "%s" created. Go ahead and create something amazing!
tr.text.admin.name_empty: Please input a name in the first line of the sign.
tr.text.howto.1: You and your opponents are separated by solid terrain encased in bedrock.
tr.text.howto.2: Mine your way through the terrain to find the other team and their bed.
tr.text.howto.3: Use what you find to craft, smelt and get geared up for the battle ahead.
tr.text.howto.4: Your bed is your lifeline. Without it, your team can't respawn.
tr.text.howto.5: Learn to navigate your tunnel network.
tr.text.howto.6: Destroy the opponents bed and players to win.
tr.text.howto.8: You can design your own levels too!
tr.text.aahelp.1: Use your creative inventory to place blocks.
tr.text.aahelp.2: The block will fill a slice, you can adjust the size.
tr.text.aahelp.4: Percentage of blocks to be replaced in the slice.
tr.text.arena.thebrewery.info: A potion oriented battle! Instead of enchanting, you can brew a variety of positive and negative potions.
tr.text.arena.tricross.info: A battle of Crossbows & Tridents! You can find them in the terracotta section along with arrows & enchantments. Make sure to craft an Anvil!
tr.text.arena.lowtechinfested.info: A simpler, fast paced layout with bows, arrows & hidden silverfish!
tr.text.arena.barrels.info: Crafting is optional. Everything you need is found in barrels. Lingering potions included!
tr.text.arena.anvilup.info: Enchantments without a table! You will find books and anvils and for enhancing your gear.
tr.text.arena.nojump.info: A fast paced game where height is restricted to two blocks.
tr.text.arena.arrowhead.info: Based on BaseGame, this one gives you a variety of tipped arrows to make use of.
tr.text.arena.mobarena.info: Based on BaseGame, this one introduces a middle area where mobs spawn.
tr.text.arena.potluck.info: A fun luck based game with minimal crafting! Get your gear from decorated pots.
tr.text.arena.noplacetohide.info: A simpler, fast paced game of Tunnel Rats. Fire Spread off is recommended
tr.text.arena.theoriginal2012.info: This is a rough estimation from memory of what this game was like when we first played in back in 2012.
tr.text.arena.hermitcrafts9.info: The layout built in survival on Hermitcraft Season 9. This is the game that brought Tunnel Rats to life again.
tr.text.instruction.block_drops: These blocks drop the following items: %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s and %s.
tr.text.admin.timer: Click %s in the next 3 seconds to confirm.
tr.text.admin.confirm.load: Are you sure you want to load a different arena?
tr.text.admin.confirm.new: Are you sure you want to create a new arena?
tr.text.admin.confirm.save: Are you sure you want to overwrite the arena "%s"?
tr.text.admin.confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the arena "%s"?
tr.text.admin.nothing_to_save: No changes detected. Nothing to save.
tr.text.admin.no_fluids: To place fluids (water / lava), use a cauldron filled with that fluid.
tr.crown.name: Winners Crown
tr.text.game.stat.kills: %s has killed %s players this round, making them the deadliest player.
tr.text.game.stat.deaths: %s is the most unfortunate player. They died %s times this round. Oof.
tr.text.game.stat.dmg_dealt: %s has dealt %s damage this round, most of all players.
tr.text.game.stat.dmg_taken: %s has taken %s damage this round, which is more than anyone else. Ouch.
tr.text.admin.instruction.1: Use your creative inventory to place blocks.
tr.text.admin.instruction.2: The block will fill a slice, you can adjust the size.
tr.text.admin.instruction.4: Percentage of blocks to be replaced in the slice.
tr.text.admin.instruction.special.title: Special Blocks
tr.text.ad.support2: We have a bedrock version on the marketplace. If you want to support us so we can make more maps in the future, please consider buying it. ‚ù§
tr.text.credits.return.name: Return to lobby
